site_name: Soho Theatre, 186 Hoe Street, Walthamstow, London, E17 4QH
description: Restoration and alterations to existing Grade II* listed building, i)including the reinstatement of front gable feature, together with the erection of three storey side and part two, part three storey rear extensions to facilitate the change of use from mixed-use assembly andleisure (Use Class D2) and drinking establishment (Use Class A4) to a mixed use (Sui Generis use class); comprising of a Theatre, together with Retail (Use Class A1), Restaurant and caf√© (Use class A3), Drinking Establishment (Use class A4), Education Facility (Use Class D1) and Assembly and Leisure facilities (Use Class D2).
